text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump had no preparation for COVID-19 in January to mid- March. US Commerce Sec Wilbur Ross claimed on 01/31/2020 that the deadly COVID-19 outbreak in China will have a positive impact on US economy. He said it will accelerate the return of jobs to the US.
